thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 6 of 1174
thread.title: Penni

author: Penni
title: Penni
text:
I used to be the food distributor for this hotel back in the early 90's. All of the Silverman's are a class act. I had my mother's 80th birthday celebration here, and it was a wonderful experience. My Interclub Tennis awards luncheon was held here years ago as well. Arcadia High School 50th year class reunion will be held here this summer, and I'm really looking forward to that, Go Titans! I know that I won't be disappointed with this venue. It only gets better here!
Highly recommend.
Penni
